Name: B&B
Review Text: The best sandwiches in town. Hooray, they are open again. Friends staff, fresh, good quality and nice sitting area. On the heart of Amsterdam. A must visit when you are here. Also ideal for take a way and ready your sandwich at one of the canals!!

Name: B&B
Review Text: Had a lovely steak and cheese sandwich on a baked roll. My wife had yogurt and fresh fruit which was superb. Great coffee, nice atmosphere and the deco looks really good too. Recommended

Name: B&B
Review Text: B&B Sandwiches and Burgers are crazy good. We were here 4 dayz in a row. Super cozy and the people are super nice, too!

Name: B&B
Review Text: Amazing place to eat breakfast. Great food and wonderful people! :)

Name: B&B
Review Text:
the food and the service was good.
I felt really taken advantage of when I paid: we had a sandwich and scrambled eggs but instead of toast asked for 2 croissants....one was 3.95!!!! …

Name: B&B
Review Text:
Great place to eat in Amsterdam

Good quality food, attention and more important in this city correct prices …

Name: B&B
Review Text: Sandwiches are really good. But they have very weird pricing. Way overpriced for what you get. Their steak sandwitches are the best in taste and price! But then all of their (smaller) normal sandwitches are 8 and above. Too unfortunate, because you definitely need 2 for a decent lunch.

Name: B&B
Review Text:
Been having late breakfasts all my life on weekends. Today B&B challenged everything I know about late breakfast. Staff, food and flavors are amazing.
I recommend it big time.

Name: B&B
Review Text: The very best sandwiches, freshly prepared!!! Hidden in plain sight. Incredibly tasty, and great recipes.

Name: B&B
Review Text: Fresh juices and delicious food! Fair pricing! Very kind service!

Name: B&B
Review Text: Had a delicious lemon and roast beef roll for lunch and the owners and staff are super friendly!

Name: B&B
Review Text: Great place for eat in Amsterdam. Good food and good prices.

Name: B&B
Review Text: wonderful food and delicious taste

Name: B&B
Review Text: Yum yum!! Delicious!! Very Good place

Name: B&B
Review Text: One of my favorite places in Amsterdam.

Name: B&B
Review Text: Great sandwiches and good service

Name: B&B
Review Text: Awesome Burgers. Would always come back

Name: B&B
Review Text: I think it closed down :(((

Name: B&B
Review Text: Great roast beef sandwich!!!

Name: B&B
Review Text: Nice people and good breakfast
